message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.
Let's be fair, Alice. This time I get the slightly better half.
Bob, my offer is getting worse for me with time. It's better to settle now before inflation eats up the difference!
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us, considering.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is getting worse and worse for me. Accept this now before we both lose out!
